reviewText: This DVD has excellent info and Ms. Tarman presents in an intelligent manner. But it's essentially hours of an informed person talking. I'm interested because I work in the field - however I think it would be too dry for many of the clients in the out patient program where I work. Maybe it would be best to just show them small segments here and there.
GREAT VERY GOOD BREAKDOWN OF THE MIND AND THE PROCESS OF ADDICTION. SHOWED THE SERIES IN GROUP AND THE CLIENTS WERE ENLIGHTENED AND LOVED THE WAY IT EXPLAINS THIER DISEASE.
